content: Investments Stocks Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Jun 2019Should I attend the Traders' Summit on the 27th of July? What are your thoughts on such events?Thinking if it's worthwhile paying $200 to $400 for this event https://www.eventbrite.com/e/join-the-biggest-stock-market-summit-in-singapore-tickets-63092769171?aff=ebapi1 answerAnswerBump0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 14 Jun 2019Frankly it may be better if you locate each of the speakers and see if they have any free previews available. Paying this amount may get you some insights but on the follow up? Will they hand hold you through the strategies mentioned? Just something to think about before you commit further.0 comments1
